name: Warm Potato-Broccoli Salad
keywords: broccoli, new potatoes, dairy-free, gluten-free, low cholesterol, low-fat, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 16 ounces whole broccoli or 8 ounces ready-cut broccoli florets (3 1/2 to 4 cups)

recipeInstructions.text: Scrub potatoes; do not peel. Cut into half-inch chunks. Cover with water, and cook about 5 minutes.
Cut up whole broccoli into bite-size florets. Add to potatoes, and cook about 5 minutes.
Wash, trim and cut scallion into small pieces.
As soon as potatoes and broccoli are cooked, drain and set aside.
In serving bowl, mix oil and vinegar. Add potatoes, broccoli and scallions, and stir well. Season with salt and pepper.
